Name: Wonder Boy Returns Remix
About the game: a Classic Arcade Masterpiece! Wonder Boy Returns Remix With High Definition Remake! Boy, our protagonist is at the beach spending time with other girls behind his girlfriend Tina’s back. That was when Tina confronts him and Boy gets punished for his behavior. While being disciplined, a red devil suddenly appears out of nowhere and kidnaps Tina. “Hold on Tina! I will save you!!!”. In order to save Tina and repent for his mistake, our Boy sets towards for a difficult adventure… A classic action masterpiece arcade game Wonder Boy has been remade into HD! Food is important for a primitive man! Collect all food before your health gets depleted, defeat all enemies, avoid all obstacles and head over to save Tina! Features: Rough terrain– Breathtaking moments of dodging action Interrupting enemy– Gratifying feeling of killing enemies Items to assist your game play– Satisfaction of earning items Boss in every last MAP of the STAGE– Activeness by killing Boss Higher score for better play– A desire to challenge for higher score Earning hidden items on each MAP– Inspire to repeat play for all CLEAR
